column3: “Smoking this pakalolo is comparable to riding a wave. You drop in to a heavy Indica full body relief.  Pop up, layback, hang-ten and enjoy the tube then carve n charge racing for the lip busting a gnarly kick out as the Sativa come alive. It's totally raddical and wickedly awesome dude.”

“It's not my favorite. This particular batch was not top shelf. Although dense, I have found 4 seeds in 3 bowls. I wonder how much of my weight actually went to what I'm sure are unusable seeds. That's on the grow/dispensary tho. Not necessarily indicative of the strain. It is a pretty even 50/50 hybrid as suggested. You get a little sativa, a little indica. It is harsh tho. Reminds you of old school regs lol. Makes f...”
“very tasty ! excellent effects”
“I've never had shatter that smells like opening a jar of chronic before this little gram of shatter is so good I'm hesitant on dabbing more so I don't run out. 🌵”
“Perfect for pain relief, good one for sure”
“This strain really didn't do anything for me.. Well it might have just been the batch but didn't really care for it and unfortunately won't be jumping to buy it again”
“good”
“This would be soo much better if the effects didn't wear off in 15 minutes... I guess this is a quick fix, but not really worth it to buy it again.”
“It makes you feel energetic and then relaxation. No headache. The quality was maybe outdoor. Not top shelf.”
“Tasty and frost. Look definitely a 5! To quote the canadian lyricist Drake. 0 to 100 real quick" ...defines how high you feel
column5: you're so stoned you don' t realize that you're coming down. I just wished it lasted longer.”"

column3: “Good solid strain, not memorable.”
“7 out of ten head high helps you focus .”

“I am prone to anxiety, so I normally stick to Indicas and high CBD strains. I don't know why I experimented with this stuff, but it's a bad fit for me personally. Just a few hits made me cranky and paranoid. YMMV”
“great frosty nugs, very dense yet fluffy buds with sweet and peppery flavors, great for relaxing. Strong medicine great for muscle issues and stress.”
“Loving this strain, on my way to pick up my 4th of July medication.”
“This would be soo much better if the effects didn't wear off in 15 minutes... I guess this is a quick fix, but not really worth it to buy it again.”
“Very strong body effects with this one, and lots of couchlock. Slows down your thoughts and movements in larger doses.”
“KILLER STRAIN....WONDERFUL NUGS.....GREAT FOR PAIN AND INSOMNIA...”

“It is a good strain for novices or maybe monthly users but lacks a good taste. The batch I got was a little harsh but did present the effects I was looking for. However, I have been smoking for 15 years on and off, so I might have a slightly higher tolerance and I am very particular when it comes to a strain being a smooth and tasty smoke. If you are just starting out, I would recommend this strain and a few others t...”
“If you stumble across a perfect batch it's fairly similar to Gorilla Glue #4. It's almost like Gorilla Glue fucked a Mango and this is it's smokable offspring :)”
“haolr”
“Nice uplifting yet smooth and didn't make me cough or cause red eye, a new fave.”

“Smells a little diesel/lime almost.. Combustion wise taste reminds me of nasty brick, vaping brings out a lot more nice complexity without so much burnt yam, more grape or lime or both..  Nice high.. Almost stony like but with energy and a focus like that”
“if you happen to find a nice batch pick some up. very tasty, lengthy, body & head high. good for stress/anxiety”
“not to bad good buzz all arouned”
“This strain really didn't do anything for me.. Well it might have just been the batch but didn't really care for it and unfortunately won't be jumping to buy it again”
“Perfect for pain relief, good one for sure”
“It makes you feel energetic and then relaxation. No headache. The quality was maybe outdoor. Not top shelf.”

“Haole hits me like a trainwreck, however it fades pretty quickly. I like this strain because I can't necessarily stay medicated all day long, but because it fades after about 2ish hours for me so I can go to work without worry.”
“I personally love this strain, it definitely helps with my knee issues. I find that I don't get as burned out with this med compared to others.”
“Sativa”
“Discovered this strain at Nature's AZ Medicines, they have a lot of quality products, I am enjoying this one in particular. It is bringing my appetite back!!!! :-)”
“I suffer from severe anxiety when driving and this miricle" strain has completely rid me of. It's not too strong for me to function and mellows me out without laying me out.

column1: It's now a must have in my medicine cabinet while I toss out the valium !”"
